info.title: Deals and Coupons
info.description:
Get all active Indian deals, offers and coupons from different stores like flipkart,amazon,shopperstop etc.
This API gets the data from various networks like payoom, icubeswire, flipkart etc

get.description: Get all the merchants/stores who have atleast 1 active deal/offer

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: This is a constant. Keep it as it is

parameters.name: submittype
parameters.description: This is a constant. Keep it as it is

parameters.name: merchant
parameters.description: Name of the merchant or store whose deals and offers you want to fetch

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Network name whose deals you want to fetch. Currently this API is tied with 5 networks : flipkart, vcommission,icubeswire,payoom and tyroo
